column2: Hudson Executive Investment Corp. is a blank check company. The Companyâ€™s business purpose is to effect a merger, capital stock exchange, asset acquisition, stock purchase, reorganization or similar business combination with one or more businesses. It pursues initial business combination in any industry, sector or geographic region. The Company focuses its search for an initial business combination in two industry sectors: financial technology and healthcare. In healthcare industry, it focuses on healthcare information technology, services and products.
